page.title: 14The Trade of Eccleshall
page.content: Eccleshall boasts a choice of butchers greengrocers, newsagents, clothing, antiques and take-away food shops; and in addition to the expected dairy, bakery, hardware, drug and craft shops there are provisions for pets, sports, betting, a shoe shop and cobblers. It is also possible to have most services rendered since there is also a dentist optician, osteopath, veterinary surgeon and vehicle repairers, while three agricultural establishments supply farmers. A number of people work from home: plumbers, decorators, electricians, builders and heating engineers, who make the community very self-sufficient. The fact that many of the businesses are family, or family partnerships, explains the friendly atmosphere in the shops, all of which are centres for meeting friends and chatting, in typical country fashion.
